name: BLUEvsRED
description:
This is my submission for the "One Button Jam"

The objective of the game is to eliminate all the red guards in the shortest time possible, your final time is given at the end. To control the player character you will only need to press down the left mouse button (slowing down time and creating pointers towards a maximum of three enemies) before releasing it to dash, your direction is controlled by your mouse. Dashing through an enemy will kill them, I hope you enjoy! 

(As a side note: I enjoyed this jam, I would have loved to have spent more time on my entry but unfortuantely the last day was mostly taken up by my job. )
